subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The New Jersey native, in the Sprint Cup top 10 before the race at Dover International Speedway, has revived his career on Michael Waltrip’s team.
snippet: The New Jersey native, in the Sprint Cup top 10 before the race at Dover International Speedway, has revived his career on Michael Waltrip’s team.
